title: Checkout 51: Gas Rewards & Grocery Cash Back
description:
Checkout 51 is a Cash Back app where you can get gas rewards and cash back that saves you tons of money on your favorite brands, groceries, and necessities. New fuel rewards where smart drivers can get their gas cash back and grocery offers on everything you buy.
Find grocery offers and fuel rewards and start saving money with coupons and Cash Back! New deals are available on everyday items from all your favorite stores. Grocery offers and cash rewards are updated every Thursday!
Gas cash back? Now, members will be able to earn up to 25¢/gallon on gas purchases. Earn Cash Back at gas stations like Shell, Chevron, BP, Exxon, Mobile and more. Earn Cash Back on Gas every time you fuel up, every week!
Grocery offers and cash back rewards are right at your fingertips. Get grocery promo savings, cash back offers and more right from your phone. Grocery offers are easy to redeem, just snap a photo of your receipt and earn cash back rewards.
Save money with these simple steps:
1. Browse grocery offers that are updated every Thursday
2. Buy groceries and other products from any store
3. Take a photo of your receipt to redeem your offer
4. Earn cash rewards!
Get the savings app that gives cash back on everyday items today with Checkout 51!
Savings apps mean no more:
- Couponing books that waste paper
- Grocery offer apps that don’t have the brands you love
- Clipping in store coupons before shopping
- Arguing with the cashier and holding up the rest of the line
Checkout 51 Features:
Store Coupon App:
- Grocery offers are updated every Thursday to find the coupons you need!
- Save money at your favorite stores like Target, Walmart, and CVS!
- We have coupons in every category for money saving opportunities
Earn Cash Back Instantly from Your Receipt:
- Save your receipt, take a picture of it and earn Cash Back
- Send your receipt for money back and you can cash out once you reach $20 in savings
- View your savings balance any time!
Gas Rewards
- Earn cash back rewards when you fill up your tank
- Fuel rewards at the gas stations you frequent
- Gas rebates to save at the pump
- Gas prices comparison to help you find the best deal on gasoline
- You have 4 hours from the time you add the offer to fill up your tank, so try to only add offers when you’re ready to head to the gas station. Note: all gas offers must be purchased with a debit or credit card.
- Upload your receipt within 24 hours.
- Wait and watch the savings roll in!
Grocery Offers at Your Favorite Stores:
- Rewards and money back from your favorite stores
- Cash Back savings! Earn from: Walmart, Target, CVS, Kroger, Safeway, Walgreens, HEB,
Publix, Costco, Whole Foods, Sam’s Club, Babies R Us and more!
- Sort grocery offers by store and category to make shopping easy
Savings on Your Favorite Products:
- Shop and save on grocery items like: Mountain Dew, Coca Cola, Gatorade, milk, cheese, bread and more
- Savings on household items like: Huggies, Pampers, Charmin, Bounty, Tide, Glade and more
- Save the offers that interest you to help quickly find them later
Search for Deals:
- Search items you’ll need this week and save money!
- Checkout 51’s new Search Bar lets you instantly find deals without scrolling
Stop coupon hunting and earn Cash Back on everything from grocery to household items. Save money and time with Checkout 51 to put more savings in your wallet!
Checkout 51 uses your location minimally while in the background to deliver in-store offers to you at the right time. Note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
If you need any support, please contact us at: https://www.checkout51.com/contact
For California Residents - Please follow this link to exercise your right to opt out of the sale of your personal information under the California Consumer Privacy Act - "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" [www.checkout51.com/CCPA-do-not-sell.]
